message.body: I know it's a bit late, but are you home by chance? I have a delivery for you :)
Hey! Sorry just seeing this now. Sure! I'm awake. Tomorrow is fine too. Leaving town tues morn.

Ha, I literally JUST got into bed. I'll leave a plastic bag in the lobby of your building on my way to work tomorrow and text you. There's something for you and ##### and also for ############ if you don't mind leaving theirs at the ### office door. :)
Awww. Of course not! Sounds good. Gnight.

Just stopped by and left your gift on the little shelf under the mailboxes. The red bag is for you and ##### - bourbon and Clementine snickerdoodles (the Clementine ones are in the smaller bag). The other two gifts are for ############, they should have cards attached.
:) Sorry they aren't coconut. I made a batch of coconut shortbread but it wasn't up to my standards.
Haha aww it's ok. It's the thought. :) i love it.
I'm glad! Thanks for bringing ############'s inside too. I hope they're in today, otherwise I guess you and ##### will be getting a lot more cookies ;)
They're here. I just talked to ##. Apparently the neighborhood doesn't hav water.
Oh no! Water main break or something? That's weird, when i showered this morning I thought the pressure felt low!
Yeah happened up north at 9 and is effecting a really wide area.
I just found the kyw article. Yikes!
Do you have water back yet? I'm thinking maybe I should delay going home today, heh
My pressure is good but I'm on the ground floor so I don't know what urs is like.
